member.summary: Contains resources pre-loaded in memory. Table of [cultureCode.ToLower + "." + stringKey.ToLower] -> [Text]

member.summary: Sets new reource string and new translation of it, updates existing resource string and its translations.

member.summary: Returns ResourceStringInfo by specified key and specified cultureCode. Always returns string object.

member.summary: Returns ResourceStringInfo by specified StringID and specified uiCultureID.

member.name: M:CMS.ResourceManager.SqlResourceManager.DeleteResourceStringInfo(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes resource string translation with specified StringKey and specified uiCulture. If uiCultureCode equals to default culture, then the resource string will be delete from all cultures, else the resource string will be deleted only from specified UICulture.
